pr_title: Migrate FileDownloader server to User model

timeline.message:

Signed-off-by: Chris Narkiewicz <hello@ezaquarii.com>

Migrate FileDownloader server to User model

Signed-off-by: Chris Narkiewicz <hello@ezaquarii.com>

timeline.bodyText:
This helper OperationsService allows us to avoid immediate refactoring of OperationsService, which is rather invasive due to extensive usage of it's API across the app.
If account is valid, conversion to user will not fail.
